subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
Horses
lead_paragraph: Big Brown, winner of this year’s Kentucky Derby, is perfect. The colt’s trainer, Rick Dutrow, once a drug-addled horseman, admittedly is not.
snippet: Big Brown, winner of this year’s Kentucky Derby, is perfect. The colt’s trainer, Rick Dutrow, once a drug-addled horseman, admittedly is not.
